Interface com.chimu.form.database.Table

public interface Table
A Table represents a connection to a database Table and are in the context (e.g. user privileges) of a DatabaseConnection. A Table knows its own scheme and can retrieve rows from the database and write rows to the database.

newBasicColumnNamed 
 public abstract Column newBasicColumnNamed(String name)
Specify that the table includes a particular basic column

newBasicColumnNamed_type 
 public abstract Column newBasicColumnNamed_type(String name,
                                                 Class javaClass)
Specify that the table includes a particular basic column with a desired javaDataType.

Parameters:
javaDataType - specifies a specific java class, but it must be among the basic datatype classes (boolean,numbers,dates, strings) to represent the column as.
See Also:
TypeConstants
newCompoundColumnNamed 
 public abstract CompoundColumn newCompoundColumnNamed(String name,
                                                       Sequence subColumnNames)
Create a compound column built out of subcolumns from subColumnNames

Parameters:
subColumnNames - Is a sequence [OrderedCollection] of subColumns for this table

isSetupValid 
 public abstract boolean isSetupValid()
Check whether the setup of this table appears to be correct. This can either be done before calling "doneSetup" or it will be done during that call.
